snippet: The Temple of Dendur at the Metropolitan Museum can be a risky setting for a classical Indian dance, but not in the case of two performers from the Nrityagram ensemble on Saturday.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance by Indian dance troupe Nrityagram Dance Ensemble in Metropolitan Museum of Art's Temple of Dendur.
lead_paragraph: The Temple of Dendur at the Metropolitan Museum can be a risky setting for a classical Indian dance, but not in the case of two performers from the Nrityagram ensemble on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Stillness and Motion and Voluptuous Curves, in a Temple Setting
headline.seo: Nrityagram Dancers at the Temple of Dendur at the Met
headline.main: Stillness and Motion and Voluptuous Curves, in a Temple Setting
